import { useState } from 'react'
import { motion, AnimatePresence } from 'framer-motion'

export default function Navbar() {
  const [isOpen, setIsOpen] = useState(false)
  const [openItems, setOpenItems] = useState({
    about: true,
    residence: true
  })

  const toggleItem = (item) => {
    setOpenItems(prev => ({
      ...prev,
      [item]: !prev[item]
    }))
  }

  const sidebarVariants = {
    hidden: { x: '100%' },
    visible: {
      x: 0,
      transition: {
        type: 'tween',
        duration: 0.5,
        ease: 'easeInOut',
        when: 'beforeChildren',
        staggerChildren: 0.2
      }
    },
    exit: {
      x: '100%',
      transition: {
        type: 'tween',
        duration: 0.5,
        ease: 'easeInOut'
      }
    }
  }

  const childVariants = {
    hidden: { opacity: 0, y: 30 },
    visible: { opacity: 1, y: 0, transition: { duration: 0.5, ease: 'easeOut' } },
    exit: { opacity: 0, y: 30, transition: { duration: 0.3, ease: 'easeIn' } }
  }

  return (
    <div className="flex justify-between items-center px-4 pt-2">

        <img src="/logo.png" className="object-cover w-20"/>
   
<button
  className="z-50 w-10 h-10 relative"
  onClick={() => setIsOpen(!isOpen)}
>
  {/* Line 1 */}
  <span
    className={`absolute top-[8px] left-1/2 w-[24px] h-[2px] bg-sky-200 transition-all duration-300 origin-center
      ${isOpen ? 'rotate-45 -translate-x-1/2 translate-y-[8px]' : '-translate-x-1/2'}`}
  />
 
  {/* Line 2 */}
  <span
    className={`absolute top-[16px] left-1/2 w-[24px] h-[2px] bg-sky-200 transition-opacity duration-300
      ${isOpen ? 'opacity-0 -translate-x-1/2' : 'opacity-100 -translate-x-1/2'}`}
  />


  {/* Line 3 */}
  <span
    className={`absolute top-[24px] left-1/2 w-[24px] h-[2px] bg-sky-200 transition-all duration-300 origin-center
      ${isOpen ? '-rotate-45 -translate-x-1/2 -translate-y-[8px]' : '-translate-x-1/2'}`}
  />
</button>






      {/* Sidebar */}
      <AnimatePresence>
        {isOpen && (
          <motion.div
            variants={sidebarVariants}
            initial="hidden"
            animate="visible"
            exit="exit"
            className="fixed top-0 right-0 h-full w-72 bg-gray-700 text-white p-6 shadow-lg space-y-4 opacity-[.90]"
          >
            <h1 className="text-2xl font-bold mb-6 mt-16">Menu</h1>

            <motion.div variants={childVariants} className="space-y-4">
              {/* About */}
              <motion.div variants={childVariants}>
                <button
                  onClick={() => toggleItem('about')}
                  className="flex items-center justify-between w-full text-left"
                >
                  <span className="text-lg font-bold">About</span>
                  <span className={`transform transition-transform duration-150 ${openItems.about ? 'rotate-45' : ''}`}>
                    +
                  </span>
                </button>
                <AnimatePresence>
                  {openItems.about && (
                    <motion.div
                      key="about-content"
                      initial={{ opacity: 0, y: 10 }}
                      animate={{ opacity: 1, y: 0 }}
                      exit={{ opacity: 0, y: 10 }}
                      transition={{ duration: 0.3, ease: 'easeInOut' }}
                      className="pl-2.5 pt-3 space-y-2 text-sm text-gray-300"
                    >
                      <p>History</p>
                      <p>Vision</p>
                      <p>Leadership</p>
                    </motion.div>
                  )}
                </AnimatePresence>
              </motion.div>

                <a className="text-lg font-bold mt-12 block">
                 Contact
              </a>


     
     

              <motion.div variants={childVariants}>
                <button
                  onClick={() => toggleItem('residence')}
                  className="flex items-center justify-between w-full text-left"
                >
                  <span className="text-lg font-bold">Residences</span>
                  <span className={`transform transition-transform duration-150 ${openItems.residence ? 'rotate-45' : ''}`}>
                    +
                  </span>
                </button>
                <AnimatePresence>
                  {openItems.residence && (
                    <motion.div
                      key="residence-content"
                      initial={{ opacity: 0, y: 10 }}
                      animate={{ opacity: 1, y: 0 }}
                      exit={{ opacity: 0, y: 10 }}
                      transition={{ duration: 0.3, ease: 'easeInOut' }}
                      className="pl-2.5 pt-3 space-y-2 text-sm text-gray-300"
                    >
                      <p>Floor Plans</p>
                      <p>Amenities</p>
                      <p>Gallery</p>
                    </motion.div>
                  )}
                </AnimatePresence>
              </motion.div>


              <a className="text-lg font-bold mt-12 block">
                 Location
              </a>


            </motion.div>
          </motion.div>
        )}

      </AnimatePresence>
    </div>
  )
}

import { motion } from "framer-motion"

export default function Lifestyle({ imgSrc, title, subtitle, paragraphs, imgBottom = "/img7.png", reverse = false }) {
  return (
    <div className="bg-[#d67233] min-h-96 relative">
      {!reverse && (
        <motion.img
          src={imgSrc}
          className="max-w-full"
          initial={{ opacity: 0, y: -50 }}
          whileInView={{ opacity: 1, y: 0 }}
          transition={{ duration: 0.9, ease: "easeInOut" }}
          viewport={{ once: true }}
        />
      )}

      <motion.section
        className="pt-4 pl-4"
        initial={{ opacity: 0, y: 30 }}
        whileInView={{ opacity: 1, y: 0 }}
        transition={{ duration: 0.8 }}
        viewport={{ once: true, amount: 0.3 }}
      >
        <h1 className="text-2xl mb-2 text-amber-200 uppercase font-semibold">{title}</h1>
        <span className="text-2xl text-amber-200 uppercase font-semibold block mb-2">{subtitle}</span>

        {paragraphs.map((text, i) => (
          <p key={i} className="mt-4">{text}</p>
        ))}

        <img src={imgBottom} className="absolute bottom-[0px] left-[0px] size-32" />
      </motion.section>

      {reverse && (
        <motion.img
          src={imgSrc}
          className="max-w-full pt-4"
          initial={{ opacity: 0, y: -50 }}
          whileInView={{ opacity: 1, y: 0 }}
          transition={{ duration: 0.9, ease: "easeInOut" }}
          viewport={{ once: true }}
        />
      )}
    </div>
  )
}

import { motion } from "framer-motion"

export default function Lifestyle({ imgSrc, title, subtitle, paragraphs, imgBottom = "/img7.png", reverse = false }) {
  return (
    <div className="bg-[#d67233] min-h-96 relative">
      {!reverse && (
        <motion.img
          src={imgSrc}
          className="max-w-full"
          initial={{ opacity: 0, y: -50 }}
          whileInView={{ opacity: 1, y: 0 }}
          transition={{ duration: 0.9, ease: "easeInOut" }}
          viewport={{ once: true }}
        />
      )}

      <motion.section
        className="pt-4 pl-4"
        initial={{ opacity: 0, y: 30 }}
        whileInView={{ opacity: 1, y: 0 }}
        transition={{ duration: 0.8 }}
        viewport={{ once: true, amount: 0.3 }}
      >
        <h1 className="text-2xl mb-2 text-amber-200 uppercase font-semibold">{title}</h1>
        <span className="text-2xl text-amber-200 uppercase font-semibold block mb-2">{subtitle}</span>

        {paragraphs.map((text, i) => (
          <p key={i} className="mt-4">{text}</p>
        ))}

<img
  src={imgBottom}
  className={`absolute bottom-0 ${reverse ? 'left-0' : 'right-0 scale-x-[-1]'} size-32 brightness-60`}
/>


      </motion.section>

      {reverse && (
        <motion.img
          src={imgSrc}
          className="max-w-full pt-4"
          initial={{ opacity: 0, y: -50 }}
          whileInView={{ opacity: 1, y: 0 }}
          transition={{ duration: 0.9, ease: "easeInOut" }}
          viewport={{ once: true }}
        />
      )}
    </div>
  )
}

export default function Lifestyle({ imgSrc, title, subtitle, paragraphs, imgBottom = "/img7.png", reverse = false }) {
  return (

import { motion } from "framer-motion"

export default function Lifestyle({ imgSrc, title, subtitle, paragraphs, imgBottom = "/img7.png", reverse = false }) {
  return (
    <div className="bg-[#d67233] min-h-96 relative xl:flex">
      {!reverse && (
        <motion.img
          src={imgSrc}
          className="max-w-full md:h-[300px] xl:h-[500px]"
          initial={{ opacity: 0, y: -50 }}
          whileInView={{ opacity: 1, y: 0 }}
          transition={{ duration: 0.9, ease: "easeInOut" }}
          viewport={{ once: true }}
        />
      )}

      <motion.section
        className="pt-4 pl-4"
       
        initial={{ opacity: 0, y: 30 }}
        whileInView={{ opacity: 1, y: 0 }}
        transition={{ duration: 0.8 }}
        viewport={{ once: true, amount: 0.3 }}
      >
        <div
  className={`md:max-w-2xl transition-all duration-300 ${
    reverse ? 'md:ml-auto md:text-right md:pr-4' : ''
  }`}
>

                      <h1 className="text-2xl mb-2 text-amber-200 uppercase font-semibold xl: pt-4">{title}</h1>
                   <span className="text-2xl text-amber-200 uppercase font-semibold block mb-2">{subtitle}</span>
        </div>

        {paragraphs.map((text, i) => (
          <p key={i} className="mt-4">{text}</p>
        ))}

<img
  src={imgBottom}
  className={`absolute bottom-0
    ${reverse
      ? 'left-0 md:right-0 md:left-auto md:scale-x-[-1]'
      : 'right-0 md:left-0 md:right-auto md:scale-x-100'
    }
    size-32 brightness-60 transition-all duration-150
  `}
/>



      </motion.section>

      {reverse && (
        <div className="md:flex justify-end flex-2">
           <motion.img
          src={imgSrc}
          className="max-w-full md:h-[300px] xl:h-[500px]"
          initial={{ opacity: 0, y: 50 }}
          whileInView={{ opacity: 1, y: 0 }}
          transition={{ duration: 0.9, ease: "easeInOut" }}
          viewport={{ once: true }}
        />
          </div>
       
      )}
    </div>
  )
}

import { useState } from 'react'
import { motion, AnimatePresence } from 'framer-motion'

export default function Navbar() {
  const [isOpen, setIsOpen] = useState(false)
  const [openItems, setOpenItems] = useState({
    about: true,
    residence: true
  })

  const toggleItem = (item) => {
    setOpenItems(prev => ({
      ...prev,
      [item]: !prev[item]
    }))
  }

  const sidebarVariants = {
    hidden: { x: '100%' },
    visible: {
      x: 0,
      transition: {
        type: 'tween',
        duration: 0.5,
        ease: 'easeInOut',
        when: 'beforeChildren',
        staggerChildren: 0.2
      }
    },
    exit: {
      x: '100%',
      transition: {
        type: 'tween',
        duration: 0.5,
        ease: 'easeInOut'
      }
    }
  }

  const childVariants = {
    hidden: { opacity: 0, y: 30 },
    visible: { opacity: 1, y: 0, transition: { duration: 0.5, ease: 'easeOut' } },
    exit: { opacity: 0, y: 30, transition: { duration: 0.3, ease: 'easeIn' } }
  }

  return (
    <div className="flex justify-between items-center px-4 pt-2">

        <img src="/logo.png" className="object-cover w-20"/>
   
<button
  className="z-50 w-10 h-10 relative"
  onClick={() => setIsOpen(!isOpen)}
>
  {/* Line 1 */}
  <span
    className={`absolute top-[8px] left-1/2 w-[24px] h-[2px] bg-sky-200 transition-all duration-300 origin-center
      ${isOpen ? 'rotate-45 -translate-x-1/2 translate-y-[8px]' : '-translate-x-1/2'}`}
  />
 
  {/* Line 2 */}
  <span
    className={`absolute top-[16px] left-1/2 w-[24px] h-[2px] bg-sky-200 transition-opacity duration-300
      ${isOpen ? 'opacity-0 -translate-x-1/2' : 'opacity-100 -translate-x-1/2'}`}
  />


  {/* Line 3 */}
  <span
    className={`absolute top-[24px] left-1/2 w-[24px] h-[2px] bg-sky-200 transition-all duration-300 origin-center
      ${isOpen ? '-rotate-45 -translate-x-1/2 -translate-y-[8px]' : '-translate-x-1/2'}`}
  />
</button>






      {/* Sidebar */}
      <AnimatePresence>
        {isOpen && (
          <motion.div
            variants={sidebarVariants}
            initial="hidden"
            animate="visible"
            exit="exit"
            className="fixed top-0 right-0 h-full w-72 bg-gray-700 text-white p-6 shadow-lg space-y-4 opacity-[.90]"
          >
            <h1 className="text-2xl font-bold mb-6 mt-16">Menu</h1>

            <motion.div variants={childVariants} className="space-y-4">
              {/* About */}
              <motion.div variants={childVariants}>
                <button
                  onClick={() => toggleItem('about')}
                  className="flex items-center justify-between w-full text-left"
                >
                  <span className="text-lg font-bold">About</span>
                  <span className={`transform transition-transform duration-150 ${openItems.about ? 'rotate-45' : ''}`}>
                    +
                  </span>
                </button>
                <AnimatePresence>
                  {openItems.about && (
                    <motion.div
                      key="about-content"
                      initial={{ opacity: 0, y: 10 }}
                      animate={{ opacity: 1, y: 0 }}
                      exit={{ opacity: 0, y: 10 }}
                      transition={{ duration: 0.3, ease: 'easeInOut' }}
                      className="pl-2.5 pt-3 space-y-2 text-sm text-gray-300"
                    >
                      <p>History</p>
                      <p>Vision</p>
                      <p>Leadership</p>
                    </motion.div>
                  )}
                </AnimatePresence>
              </motion.div>

                <a className="text-lg font-bold mt-12 block">
                 Contact
              </a>


     
     

              <motion.div variants={childVariants}>
                <button
                  onClick={() => toggleItem('residence')}
                  className="flex items-center justify-between w-full text-left"
                >
                  <span className="text-lg font-bold">Residences</span>
                  <span className={`transform transition-transform duration-150 ${openItems.residence ? 'rotate-45' : ''}`}>
                    +
                  </span>
                </button>
                <AnimatePresence>
                  {openItems.residence && (
                    <motion.div
                      key="residence-content"
                      initial={{ opacity: 0, y: 10 }}
                      animate={{ opacity: 1, y: 0 }}
                      exit={{ opacity: 0, y: 10 }}
                      transition={{ duration: 0.3, ease: 'easeInOut' }}
                      className="pl-2.5 pt-3 space-y-2 text-sm text-gray-300"
                    >
                      <p>Floor Plans</p>
                      <p>Amenities</p>
                      <p>Gallery</p>
                    </motion.div>
                  )}
                </AnimatePresence>
              </motion.div>


              <a className="text-lg font-bold mt-12 block">
                 Location
              </a>


            </motion.div>
          </motion.div>
        )}

      </AnimatePresence>
    </div>
  )
}

muá»‘n chiáº¿n há»¯u, hover ra submenu, Ä‘Ã¢y Ä‘ang lÃ  file navbar 375px (t gá»i lÃ  navbar header giá»‘ng nhau

import { useState } from 'react'
import { motion, AnimatePresence } from 'framer-motion'

export default function Navbar() {
  const [isOpen, setIsOpen] = useState(false)
  const [openItems, setOpenItems] = useState({
    about: true,
    residence: true
  })

  const toggleItem = (item) => {
    setOpenItems(prev => ({
      ...prev,
      [item]: !prev[item]
    }))
  }

  const sidebarVariants = {
    hidden: { x: '100%' },
    visible: {
      x: 0,
      transition: {
        type: 'tween',
        duration: 0.5,
        ease: 'easeInOut',
        when: 'beforeChildren',
        staggerChildren: 0.2
      }
    },
    exit: {
      x: '100%',
      transition: {
        type: 'tween',
        duration: 0.5,
        ease: 'easeInOut'
      }
    }
  }

  const childVariants = {
    hidden: { opacity: 0, y: 30 },
    visible: { opacity: 1, y: 0, transition: { duration: 0.5, ease: 'easeOut' } },
    exit: { opacity: 0, y: 30, transition: { duration: 0.3, ease: 'easeIn' } }
  }

  return (
    <div className="flex justify-between items-center px-4 pt-2">

        <img src="/logo.png" className="object-cover w-20"/>
   
<button
  className="z-50 w-10 h-10 relative"
  onClick={() => setIsOpen(!isOpen)}
>
  {/* Line 1 */}
  <span
    className={`absolute top-[8px] left-1/2 w-[24px] h-[2px] bg-sky-200 transition-all duration-300 origin-center
      ${isOpen ? 'rotate-45 -translate-x-1/2 translate-y-[8px]' : '-translate-x-1/2'}`}
  />
 
  {/* Line 2 */}
  <span
    className={`absolute top-[16px] left-1/2 w-[24px] h-[2px] bg-sky-200 transition-opacity duration-300
      ${isOpen ? 'opacity-0 -translate-x-1/2' : 'opacity-100 -translate-x-1/2'}`}
  />


  {/* Line 3 */}
  <span
    className={`absolute top-[24px] left-1/2 w-[24px] h-[2px] bg-sky-200 transition-all duration-300 origin-center
      ${isOpen ? '-rotate-45 -translate-x-1/2 -translate-y-[8px]' : '-translate-x-1/2'}`}
  />
</button>






      {/* Sidebar */}
      <AnimatePresence>
        {isOpen && (
          <motion.div
            variants={sidebarVariants}
            initial="hidden"
            animate="visible"
            exit="exit"
            className="fixed top-0 right-0 h-full w-72 bg-gray-700 text-white p-6 shadow-lg space-y-4 opacity-[.90]"
          >
            <h1 className="text-2xl font-bold mb-6 mt-16">Menu</h1>

            <motion.div variants={childVariants} className="space-y-4">
              {/* About */}
              <motion.div variants={childVariants}>
                <button
                  onClick={() => toggleItem('about')}
                  className="flex items-center justify-between w-full text-left"
                >
                  <span className="text-lg font-bold">About</span>
                  <span className={`transform transition-transform duration-150 ${openItems.about ? 'rotate-45' : ''}`}>
                    +
                  </span>
                </button>
                <AnimatePresence>
                  {openItems.about && (
                    <motion.div
                      key="about-content"
                      initial={{ opacity: 0, y: 10 }}
                      animate={{ opacity: 1, y: 0 }}
                      exit={{ opacity: 0, y: 10 }}
                      transition={{ duration: 0.3, ease: 'easeInOut' }}
                      className="pl-2.5 pt-3 space-y-2 text-sm text-gray-300"
                    >
                      <p>History</p>
                      <p>Vision</p>
                      <p>Leadership</p>
                    </motion.div>
                  )}
                </AnimatePresence>
              </motion.div>

                <a className="text-lg font-bold mt-12 block">
                 Contact
              </a>


     
     

              <motion.div variants={childVariants}>
                <button
                  onClick={() => toggleItem('residence')}
                  className="flex items-center justify-between w-full text-left"
                >
                  <span className="text-lg font-bold">Residences</span>
                  <span className={`transform transition-transform duration-150 ${openItems.residence ? 'rotate-45' : ''}`}>
                    +
                  </span>
                </button>
                <AnimatePresence>
                  {openItems.residence && (
                    <motion.div
                      key="residence-content"
                      initial={{ opacity: 0, y: 10 }}
                      animate={{ opacity: 1, y: 0 }}
                      exit={{ opacity: 0, y: 10 }}
                      transition={{ duration: 0.3, ease: 'easeInOut' }}
                      className="pl-2.5 pt-3 space-y-2 text-sm text-gray-300"
                    >
                      <p>Floor Plans</p>
                      <p>Amenities</p>
                      <p>Gallery</p>
                    </motion.div>

                </AnimatePresence>
              </motion.div>


              <a className="text-lg font-bold mt-12 block">
                 Location
              </a>


            </motion.div>
          </motion.div>
        )}

      </AnimatePresence>
    </div>
  )
}

import { motion } from "framer-motion"

export default function Lifestyle({ imgSrc, title, subtitle, paragraphs, imgBottom = "/img7.png", reverse = false }) {
  return (
    <div className="bg-[#d67233] min-h-96 relative xl:flex xl:mt-[200px]">
      {!reverse && (
        <motion.img
          src={imgSrc}
          className="max-w-full md:h-[300px] xl:h-[500px]"
          initial={{ opacity: 0, y: -50 }}
          whileInView={{ opacity: 1, y: 0 }}
          transition={{ duration: 0.9, ease: "easeInOut" }}
          viewport={{ once: true }}
        />
      )}

      <motion.section
        className="pt-4 pl-4"
       
        initial={{ opacity: 0, y: 30 }}
        whileInView={{ opacity: 1, y: 0 }}
        transition={{ duration: 0.8 }}
        viewport={{ once: true, amount: 0.3 }}
      >
        <div
  className={`md:max-w-2xl transition-all duration-300 ${
    reverse ? 'md:ml-auto md:text-right md:pr-4' : ''
  }`}
>

                      <h1 className="text-2xl mb-2 text-amber-200 uppercase font-semibold xl: pt-4">{title}</h1>
                   <span className="text-2xl text-amber-200 uppercase font-semibold block mb-2">{subtitle}</span>
        </div>

        {paragraphs.map((text, i) => (
          <p key={i} className="mt-4">{text}</p>
        ))}

<img
  src={imgBottom}
  className={`absolute bottom-0
    ${reverse
      ? 'left-0 md:right-0 md:left-auto md:scale-x-[-1]'
      : 'right-0 md:left-0 md:right-auto md:scale-x-100'
    }
    size-32 brightness-60 transition-all duration-150
  `}
/>



      </motion.section>

      {reverse && (
        <div className="md:flex justify-end flex-2">
           <motion.img
          src={imgSrc}
          className="max-w-full md:h-[300px] xl:h-[500px]"
          initial={{ opacity: 0, y: 50 }}
          whileInView={{ opacity: 1, y: 0 }}
          transition={{ duration: 0.9, ease: "easeInOut" }}
          viewport={{ once: true }}
        />
          </div>
       
      )}
    </div>
  )
}

import { Swiper, SwiperSlide } from 'swiper/react'
